citations.narrative:
The contingency plan was last reviewed in March of 2023. Annual review of the contingency plan, and documentation of
the review, ensures that the facility is updating and training as needed for emergency preparedness for animal welfare.
The facility must review and document review of the plan on an annual basis.
Correct by 10/22/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The contingency plan was last reviewed in March of 2023. Annual review of the contingency plan, and documentation of 
the review, ensures that the facility is updating and training as needed for emergency preparedness for animal welfare. 
The facility must review and document review of the plan on an annual basis. 
 
Correct by 10/22/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
